title: Metallica Revenge v1.1.2.ipa

SOME HUGE GAME FEATURES TOTALLY NEW TO THE TAP TAP REVENGE FAMILY ....
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 10 huge rock mega-hits by Metallica
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 4 boss tracks, with some of the most difficult tapping action ever in Tap Tap Revenge.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Hard tracks in landscape mode with four rails, and an incredible Extreme mode with tracks in landscape mode with FIVE rails. Another Tap Tap Revenge first!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Arcade mode, allowing you to test your mettle against weapons thrown at you by the computer.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Battle mode, so that you can go head to head against your friends on Bluetooth, lobbing weapons at one another to break streak and gain the advantage!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Four addictive difficulty levels, each with unlockable boss tracks
